mapreducescript.description: Created 04/2022 by MDIMKOV this M/R scripts is used for mass-deletion of records based on saved searches create a saved search with ID such as [customsearch_massdel_mysuffix] in this field enter your suffix, such as [_jes] this way you can toggle between different saved searches (e.g. one for journal entries and one for a custom record etc.) for more information please contact milcho.dimkov@inplenion.com
mapreducescript.name: MD Mass Delete Records
